This problem would occur if you had text which had a selection and you set new text and disabled the component in the same invalidation loop.   In this case it is not possible to preserve the selection.
QE notes: add a test please

For RET, fix case where pasted text contains only restricted characters.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

For password fields (displayAsPassword=true), disable the IME, when the field gets focus.  I checked with Masa in Globalization and Gang in TLF and they concurred this is the correct thing to do.  According to Masa, Windows and Mac OSX automatically disable the IME when logging on.  They said neither Japanese or Chinese uses composite characters in passwords.
